data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ARUBA cruise from Rio de Janeiro to Batavia started at 1847-01-10

Ship: Aruba (Schoener), Voyage: Rio De Janeiro - Batavia, 1st Observer: C.J. Berghuis (Ltz), Company: MAR, Other ship information: BEWAPEND MET EEN GRANAATSTUK A 30 POND EN ZES DRAAIBUSSEN A 1 POND. BEMAND MET 25 KOPPEN
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
